text: {{Infobox Settlement |name = Bakrani |official_name = باڪراڻي |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = Town |total_type = |motto = |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |blank_emblem_size = |image_map = |mapsize = |map_caption = |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |image_dot_map = |dot_mapsize = |dot_map_caption = |dot_x = |dot_y = |pushpin_map = |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_map_caption = |pushpin_mapsize = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = Pakistan |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = Sindh |subdivision_type2 = District |subdivision_name2 = Larkana |subdivision_type3 = Taluka |subdivision_name3 = Bakrani |seat_type = |seat = |parts_type = Union Council |parts_style = |parts = |p1 = |p2 = |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = |area_land_km2 = 3 |area_water_km2 = |area_total_sq_mi = |area_land_sq_mi = |area_water_sq_mi = |area_water_percent = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |elevation_max_m = |elevation_max_ft = 169 |elevation_min_m = |elevation_min_ft = |population_as_of = |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = ~20000 |population_density_km2 = |population_density_sq_mi = |timezone = PST |utc_offset = +5 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coor_type = |coordinates= |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} Bakrani () is a town in Larkana District, Sindh province of Pakistan. This town is 12 km south of Larkana city on the Larkana-Mohenjo-daro road. It has an altitude of 53 metresLocation of Bakrani - Falling Rain Genomics and is the headquarters of Bakrani Taluka. ==References== Category:Larkana District
